head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending ¶ ¶ June 30th ¶ ¶...

div.p: M77/5484, unit 944, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary
I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the Quarter ending June 30th 1877.

cell.p:
75
The nine entries on the first three rows have all been ticked, presumably at the Chief Secretary's Department.

Ferd. von Mueller
